name: Agriculture Wool Apparel Manufacturers Trust Fund
popular_name: Agriculture Wool Apparel Manufacturers Trust Fund
objective: The Agriculture Wool Apparel Manufacturers Trust Fund was established to reduce the injury to domestic manufacturers resulting from tariffs on wool fabric that are higher than tariffs on certain apparel articles made of wool fabric.

results.description: In FY 2024, USDA made the mandated payments to eligible manufacturers by the statutory deadline.

rules_regulations: Application information and details will be provided each year via the FAS website.
